Articles.Content: I don't know if it's just me, but I'm having some trouble with some of the pre-assembled .craft's. The "ORION DEMO.craft" and "EMLV II - Orion.craft" will bug out my game if I load them, forcing a restart. I have not tried with any other craft files. The bug is similar to what happens if you pull in a subassembly whithout having at least one part already in place. I pretty much can't construct the craft myself, as all the crafts in CMES are very complicated.

@ Konnor

That was for a LifeSupport mod http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93328-0-25-Asmi-s-ECLSS-Mod-REVIVED!-%28Version-1-0-18%29 if you had it installed it show how much Oxygen you have left it was in the Prop folder ECLSSeng.

EDIT- And thanks again looking great.

Edited November 7, 2014 by Mecripp2

I don't know if it's just me, but I'm having some trouble with some of the pre-assembled .craft's. The "ORION DEMO.craft" and "EMLV II - Orion.craft" will bug out my game if I load them, forcing a restart. I have not tried with any other craft files. The bug is similar to what happens if you pull in a subassembly whithout having at least one part already in place. I pretty much can't construct the craft myself, as all the crafts in CMES are very complicated.

Could you try re downloading the pack and starting with a fresh copy of .25?

Yes, perhaps. ISS panels are black on an orange support structure - this is why they can, at times, seem orange. BTW, I'm releasing the updated American Pack later this evening, you can grab the Orion interior from there and re-prop it with ALCOR switches. Should be easier than making a bespoke IVA.

BobCat ind. doesn't work for you? Shame, it seems to be working just fine on my end. I'm not saying there is no room for improvements, but last time I checked, everything ran fine (and people seem to confirm that, so the problem is on your end). Reinstall, check dependencies, you know the drill. If you mean CSS, it's being remade from scratch, no point fixing it now (besides, it also mostly works. The few things that don't are the reason it's being remade). I'm not currently actively working on any other mods, except an effects pack for FASA RO that is not yet released.

CMS is supposed to look realistic, so drop the "game about little green men" argument, it's been done to death and isn't really valid. KSP is supposed to be realistic.

When the last time you checked the OP really ? and my stuff works better then anything you have put out.

EDIT- And, I think the key word is But isn't.

Come on guys, PM, social media, anywhere else would be more appropriate for that conversation, it's disrespectful for people coming here with technical issues looking for answers.

Sorry YANFRET it was off topic.

EDIT- And YANFRET did you ever dock 2 rovers or rover with a base part ? Did the kerbals stay ?

Edited November 7, 2014 by Mecripp2
Just to let you know, the American Pack is out. I've fixed the Altair landing legs. There's also an IVA for Orion. Check it out and see if there's anything of use in there.

Alright, so after a little testing, I found that you forgot to rename the OME for the Orion. The part name is the same as the one in Aerojet Kerbodyne, which causes it to bug out when the same part name is used twice. I'm changing the name to ChakaOME on my local install.

Additionally, the LES for the Orion pod is not powerful enough to pull the capsule away from the rocket. I suggest upping both the fuel amount and the thrust of the LES.

Another bug I noticed is that I can't right click on any parts from this pack while in flight. The context menu simply does not show up, which could become a problem when trying to undock and such.
Regarding the last bug, I've noticed it too, but it's not consistent. Sometimes, right-click works fine, but it does bug out quite often.
Some of it was talked about a couple of post back http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64993-Chaka-Monkey-Exploration-Odyssey-0-25-2?p=1527869&viewfull=1#post1527869 think he is working on it.

Alright, so after a little testing, I found that you forgot to rename the OME for the Orion. The part name is the same as the one in Aerojet Kerbodyne, which causes it to bug out when the same part name is used twice. I'm changing the name to ChakaOME on my local install.

Additionally, the LES for the Orion pod is not powerful enough to pull the capsule away from the rocket. I suggest upping both the fuel amount and the thrust of the LES.

Another bug I noticed is that I can't right click on any parts from this pack while in flight. The context menu simply does not show up, which could become a problem when trying to undock and such.

Hmmm ooops

Yeah we need to fix that, and there is a glitch I'm working out re the right click, il get those two issues plus the les power fixed tonight and then upload 0.25.3

Thankyou for figuring that out!

Just to let you know, the American Pack is out. I've fixed the Altair landing legs. There's also an IVA for Orion. Check it out and see if there's anything of use in there.

Excellent. Thankyou!

Edited November 7, 2014 by YANFRET

Okay that's sorted. The issue is depending on what modules are present, sometimes the science container has to be first and sometimes the lab must be first. I'l get the rest of the pods fixed up presently, and do the other things

Hmmm ooops

Yeah we need to fix that, and there is a glitch I'm working out re the right click, il get those two issues plus the les power fixed tonight and then upload 0.25.3

Thankyou for figuring that out!

No problem

Okay I got it this time, the correct module order is Earth, Water, Fire, Air, Ether... wait...

Update forthcoming
What lol Earth, Water, Fire, Air ?

What lol Earth, Water, Fire, Air ?

lol nevermind, go back to the dinner table, everything is fine in the kitchen, we'l be out in a moment.

BETA 0.25.6

Download from Dropbox:

Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems, GmbH is a space program based on NASA and Boeing future proposals using heavily modified parts from a wide variety of content authors as well as new original parts, aligned to look and work together for one purpose: realistic simulation of space exploration. This project is modeled at 75% real scale.

Changelog:


Updated to 0.25.6
-Removed MechJeb casing from Support Lander craft file
-Removed duplicate OMS engine asset
-Increased RS68 node attach to 3



Updated to 0.25.5
[B]-Fixed right click issue on habitats and pods (caused by science module order)
-Fixed asset name issue of Aerojet Kerbodyne OMS engine
-Recreated affected craft files (this part breaks saves)
-Increased power and capacity of Orion LES
-Moved Orion LES function into the staging order before fairing sep[/B]






Updated to 0.25.2
-Fixed Cargo Bag prop path to fix craft loading issue
-Removed Porkjet plugin to fix craft loading issue




Updated to 0.25
-Fixed node placement for .25 on numerous parts
-Added career mode support
-Added science support
-Added TAC life support .... support
-Reintroduced porkjet IVA's
-100+ new textures
-50+ part cfg adjustments
-10+ Revised craft files
-Removed any parts not needed by new craft
-Added NOS Altair and Lander
-Added Monkey HTV and node habitat
-Added Monkey static solar
-Added KW inline SRB (modified)
-Added Aerojet Kerbodyne Orion thrusters
-Many more changes to be listed later




Updated to 0.12
-Removed all PorkWorks IVA content to avoid conflict with JSI (look forward to adding those back in the future)
-Changed all Pods and Habitat internals to ALCOR MONKEY IVA
-Updated some EEMLV Station craft files 
-Added EEMLV - Station Core Truss and Station Science craft files
-Enlarged fairing on Munar 2x craft to prevent failure
-Fixed SLS Block 1 staging issue


Updated to 0.11
-Added missing ALCOR emissive texture which caused capsule to turn white if interior flood lights were turned on.
-Added instructional message to main page insisting on latest JSI release.


Updated to 0.1:
-Initial BETA release

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ KSP 0.25 REQUIRED! / DELETE ALL PREVIOUS VERSION FILES!

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Recommend installing this pack into a clean KSP install for the first time.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ If you are using JSI, please make sure you have the most current version

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Procedural Fairings DLL is included (required) in this download. Please be aware of potential conflicts if you have an older version already.

Notes:

Copy CMES to gamedata.

Optional ALCOR props folder included for rover IVA

Copy VAB folder to Ships

Copy Subassemblies to your save (optional)

Important:

CAREER MODE AND SANDBOX MODE NOW FULLY SUPPORTED

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement is highly recommended.

General Instructions:

All Chaka Monkey flight vehicles are optimized for the following flight path:

You don't have to use autopilot, but you can if you like. Feel free to experiment with other flight paths.

Before attempting to drive Alcor Monkey Rover, disable torque on rover base and ASET pod!!

* Warranty void if operation by non-monkey technician is attempted.

* Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems, GmbH is licensed by the original authors noted below to distribute this content.

* These parts should not interfere with content you may already have from these authors with one exception; the procedural fairings DLL is included in this -- so you need to be extra aware if you have another copy of that around somewhere and deal with that. I expect you may use whichever version of the DLL you prefer or the one included here, however please do not use this download as a reference for the most current version of the procedural fairings DLL.

Downloadable items on this page contain modified content made available under the conditions of original license from:

Chaka the Monkey would like to extend a special thank you to these developers. They worked very hard to make these parts and we have organized them for Monkey Exploration because they are excellent.

I can tell you it's related to RPM. I uninstalled that and stopped getting the bug.

Still have the bug .25.6

EDIT- And it's the same crafts

EDIT- Getting a warning message about the Struts and got 2 just says error Input is null and a error with TransmitterModule part Module 0 doesn't implement IScalarModule

Edited November 8, 2014 by Mecripp2

Still have the bug .25.6

I think it's because if you install JSI it adds a config

INTERNAL

{

name = orbitalOrbInternalsRPM

MODEL

{

model = HabitatPack/Spaces/orbitalOrbInternals/model

}

MODULE

{

looking for orbital orb in it's habitatpack directory

EDIT: I can confirm this I just caused the crash by putting this JSI config in my gamedata.

SO orbitalorbinternals gets a new asset name and I edit a bunch of CFG's, then it's fixed.

Edit: Yes that definitely fixed it.

Edited November 8, 2014 by YANFRET

So we just need to rename the path for

model = HabitatPack/Spaces/orbitalOrbInternals/model
to
model = CMES/Hab/HabitatPack/Spaces/orbitalOrbInternals/model

Hey YANFRET, there are more parts that need renaming. One of the inflatable heatshields have the same name as the original, and the static solar truss from Near Future bugs out too. I have verified that the names are conflicting in the .cfg.

Oh, and by the way, even including the old .cfg of the OME (the one where you changed the title to "remove this") will cause weirdness, so please remove that .cfg from the download.
YES YES we have Launch :kiss:
